docs.abstract: Susana Raab has been documenting Americans' love affair with fast food. Like many affairs, it can take outlandish turns. And funny ones.
docs.lead_paragraph: When Susana Raab began her "Consumed" project, she knew that she was photographing as an outsider. She had never worked at a fast food restaurant and rarely ate at one. Though born on the same day that the Big Mac was invented, she had never eaten one. So she did.
docs.snippet: Susana Raab has been documenting Americans' love affair with fast food. Like many affairs, it can take outlandish turns. And funny ones.
